definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an automatically drinking device for fowls, which is made of nontoxic plastics.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種家禽類飼養自動飲水器。

sentences.english: When installing the automatic waterer, make sure that the water pipes to the unit are below the frost line.
sentences.chinese: 當安裝飲水器時，務必確保水管到裝置低於凍結線。

sentences.english: Turn the bottle on the normal position, the water will be automatically outflow until keeping balance.
sentences.chinese: 翻轉飲水器至一般地位，瓶中水主動流出抵達均衡處。

sentences.english: Vikings may have been buried with their helmets and with drinking horns.
sentences.chinese: 頭盔和角形飲水器可能是跟着維京人一起掩埋的。

sentences.english: But the drinking fountain next to the field stands empty the water dripping to the ground instead of into the players mouths.
sentences.chinese: 但是，球場邊的飲水器裏沒有水。

sentences.english: Automatic watering device can be mounted on back.
